titles.title: Break Forth O Beauteous Heavenly Light

authors.author: Johann Rist Johann Schop John Troutbeck Joseph Bar

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Break forth O beauteous heavenly light newline And usher in the morning; newline O shepherds, shudder not with fright, newline But hear the angel's warning. newline This Child, now weak in infancy, newline Our confidence and joy shall be, newline The power of Satan breaking; newline Our peace eternal making.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He comes a Child, from realms on high, newline He comes the heav'ns adoring; newline He comes to earth to live and die, newline A broken race restoring. newline Although the King of kings is He, newline He comes in deep humility; newline His people to deliver, newline And reign in us forever.
